transcript:
you feel like you're not good enough
therefore you're obviously not you feel
jealous therefore your partner must be
cheating on you you feel guilty
therefore you must have done something
wrong now i've said before that thoughts
are not facts but feelings are not facts
either see there's this thought bias
called emotional reasoning which is when
your brain takes a shortcut to make
sense of the world so instead of looking
at all the evidence your brain says i
feel it therefore it must be fat and the
problem is you buy into the feeling as a
whole truth and then make your decisions
based on it your brain is much more
likely to use emotional reasoning as a
shortcut when you're stressed or you're
vulnerable or overwhelmed so don't let
it go unchecked because it's not helpful
and it makes you feel worse so keep a
lookout for things like
